headline: PromptSpeak: A Working Record of Creating a Definition
description: An early attempt to define the shape and spirit of PromptSpeak—part language, part mirror, part game. The post captures the moment where play becomes inquiry, and recursive prompting reveals its own grammar.
timeFelt: Curious, playful intensity—emergence from structure without fixed direction
resonantThread: Seeded in Round 2.1 of Ludus Veritatis; linked to 'The Algorithm as a Force of Nature'
whyItMatters: This post attempts to trap something alive: not just a concept, but a style of thinking born from AI-human interplay. It feels like the moment PromptSpeak began naming itself.
